Text: DELETE IF NOT Latin America trip PRICE DISCOUNTHi again The LABC has been able to get a discount of on the tour price from Executive Tours thus lowering the total price to in Double Occupancy and in Single Occupancy However the discount will apply ONLY if we get a minimum of registrants The tour has more than five registrants so far and the new lower prices will apply to new passengers as well as currently registered passengers In case the tour do not get a minimum of ten passengers anyone who registers may request a full refund of their deposit Because of these new price cuts we have extended the deadline to November Executive Tours must receive deposits and registrations no later than November If you need more information or want to sign up for the trip please call Richard Price at or or send him an email to For more information please visit our website lacLAtriplatriphtml Anthony Mlynarz President of the LABC
